definition: mixed feelings of grief and joy
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: To see his likeness perpetuated in marble is to me today a sad but pleasing sensation.
sentences.chinese: 今天，看到他的大理石雕像樹立起來了，我悲喜交集。

sentences.english: Everybody is touching truncal lash mark, mixed feelings of grief and joy, shed excited tear.
sentences.chinese: 大家摸着樹幹鞭痕，悲喜交集，流下了激動的眼淚。

definition: all sorts of feelings well up in one's heart
unable to control one's grief (idiom); overwrought/overcome with sorrow/heartbroken
cannot control oneself (idiom)/to be beside oneself
lit. to feel as if one's intestines have been cut short/broken-hearted (idiom)
lit. liver and guts cut to pieces (idiom)/fig. grief-stricken
